sandhanaya wisin gath thinduwak pilibanda prashna karannata kisiwakutath ayithiyak nomathi bawa awadharanaya kala amathiwaraya siyaludenama katayuthu kala yuththe sandhanaye wyawasthawata anukulawa bawath pawasiya.amathiwaraya ese prakasha kale eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya shri lanka nidahas paksha mulasthanaye pawathwu madhya hamuwakata eeye (04) ekwemini.uuwa palath sabhawe maha amathiwaraya lesa shashindra rajapaksha mahatha path kirima sambandhayen anugamanaya kala prathipaththiya pilibanda nangu prashnayakata pilithuru washayen amathiwaraya prakasha kale ema mathiwaranayedi shashindra rajapaksha mahatha maha amathi apekshakaya lesa sandhanaya wisin nam kara thibu nisa thanathura pradanaya kala bawayi.ewani udaharana ithihasaya pura oona tharam dakinnata athi bawath thama basnahira palath sabhawata tharaga kaleth maha amathi apekshakaya lesin bawath amathiwaraya pawasiya.shri lanka nidahas pakshaye mahalekam, saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena, rajya paripalana ha swadesha katayuthu amathi dabliw.
